Posts.Content: Jun 21, 2017 10:05AM jmayersf wrote: If you have the option, I would be more inclined to go to a Breast Surgeon. If it were me, I would want the benefit of a specialist who has seen this many times and knows how to take a sample and get the margins. However, I am not sure that going to a another General Surgeon in a different town would make that much difference. Best of luck!
Posts.Title: Atypical Ductal Hyperplasia - Where Should I get a Consultation Sjb2 MinusTwo
